value:
$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Heading to Nifl, are you? You'll even
throw away the lives of your people
to make an escape... Pitiful.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Surtr...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Throw them away? Never! After we
find a way to defeat you, we'll be back
soon enough. And we'll be ready!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|You...defeat me? Fascinating. But do
you really think you'll make it to Nifl?$k$pAnd even if you do...$k$pTell me, Askran prince. Do you see
that town over there? Isn't it filled with
Askran citizens?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Grrr...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Abandon them. I don't care. But if you
do... I will burn that town to the
ground. Everyone there will die.$k$pI'll make sure of it. Women, children...
One by one, they will burn alive. I
promise you I will do this.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Surtr!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Let me tell you something you might
not know...
$k$pBeing burned alive is one of the most
painful ways to die.$k$p$EFace_Smile|First, the skin burns off... Then the
muscles themselves begin to fall
apart. In the end, they all wail...$k$p"Please... Kill me! Please!"$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What drives your madness?$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Do you want to help them, whelp?
Kneel before me and offer your own
neck.$k$pBeg for mercy.$k$pDo that, and I might let your people
be.$k$pYou can't know until you try!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Grr...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|What will you do—protect your
people, or let them die?
$EFace_Cool|The choice is yours!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The gate is open! Hurry!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|If we leave now... The people...
Surtr...he'll...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Grr...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I understand your feelings, Sharena.
But we have to stay rational, here.$k$pThink things through. If we fight Surtr
now, we'll be killed. The townspeople
will still die.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But if we leave, we're just offering
them up for the slaughter!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|We were offered a choice: defend the
people, or abandon them. Fight and
die... Or flee, and live to fight again...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|My mind is made up. I will go to Nifl.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|This is my decision. It has nothing to
do with you, Sharena. Nor am I blindly
following Commander Anna's orders.$k$pI will leave my people behind...and go
to Nifl.$k$pAnd I swear that we will defeat Surtr.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Ha-hah! It seems the children of Askr
have some spirit after all.$k$p$EFace|It would have been so disappointing
had they made the foolish choice to
perish nobly alongside their people...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|So your threat was a failure.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|You could say so. It has, however,
given me something to look forward
to...$k$pInto town! We will burn them all to
ash, just as I promised the young
prince.$k$p$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|The enemy has escaped! We gain
nothing by this.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|I'm the one who decides what we do,
and what we don't.$k$pThe flames must taste the flesh of
many, many more people...$k$p$EFace_Smile|You may wait here while I burn them
all myself. I'll show them who is king!
Ha-ha-hah!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|No. I cannot allow this.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You what?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Askr must die. The people, however...
Once this land is conquered, they
will become Embla's.$k$pA ruler's duty is to the people, is it
not?$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Ha-hah! Oh, how amusing.$k$pYou'd give me orders, Princess? Do
you imagine you can enforce them?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Grr...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|My enthusiasm for this alliance has
cooled. The time has come to settle
things between us.$k$pI'll show you that I am the true ruler.$k$p$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|Very well. Prepare to face me, then.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Ha-ha! If you are looking to be
slaughtered, I can oblige you...
All of you!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Now, now, my king. Is this any cause
for a fight? Truly?$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Stay out of this, Loki. In the heat of
battle, my flames might find you, too.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Roast me, boil me, or fry me...I don't
care. But you should know that the
town you're bickering over is empty.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|What?!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|It seems that Prince Alfonse signaled
them. Was that little boy thinking of his
people? How adorable!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Hmph. The rats have fled. How dull.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|So, let's move on, shall we? The
Askran people have plenty of time to
learn all about your flames...$k$pWe have the rite to think about, too.
The Flames of Múspell.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Heh. That is true. I should keep that
girl alive...for now, anyway.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Hm?$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Laevatein!$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Yes.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Track the Askran royals. Do not
rest until you have killed them.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Yes, lord.$k$p$Sbs150|
